    • Method Detail

      • getCHESSEditor

        public static org.eclipse.papyrus.editor.PapyrusMultiDiagramEditor getCHESSEditor()
        If the active editor's input belongs to a project with the CHESS nature then return the editor.
        Returns:
        the editor if it is a CHESS editor, null otherwise.

      • getDiagram

        public static org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.notation.Diagram getDiagram()
        Get the current active diagram from the active editor. It uses the org.eclipse.papyrus.infra.core.utils.EditorUtils.getMultiDiagramEditor() utility method.
        Returns:
        the active Diagram object. It can be null.

      • getDiagram

        public static org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.notation.Diagram getDiagram(org.eclipse.papyrus.editor.PapyrusMultiDiagramEditor editor)
        Get the current active diagram given the editor.
        Parameters:
        the - editor. It should be not null.
        Returns:
        the active Diagram object. It can be null.

      • getDiagramCommandStack

        public static org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.diagram.ui.parts.DiagramCommandStack getDiagramCommandStack()
        Return the DiagramEditPart from the active workbench page.
        Returns:
        the DiagramCommandStack. It can be null.

      • getDiagramEditPart

        public static org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.diagram.ui.editparts.DiagramEditPart getDiagramEditPart()
        Return the DiagramEditPart from the active editor. It uses the org.eclipse.papyrus.infra.core.utils.EditorUtils.getMultiDiagramEditor() utility method.
        Returns:
        the DiagramEditPart. It can be null.

      • getDiagramGraphicalViewer

        public static org.eclipse.gmf.runtime.diagram.ui.parts.IDiagramGraphicalViewer getDiagramGraphicalViewer()
        Return the graphical viewer from the active editor. It uses the org.eclipse.papyrus.infra.core.utils.EditorUtils.getMultiDiagramEditor() utility method.
        Returns:
        the IDiagramGraphicalViewer. It can be null.

      • getDiagramStatus

        public static org.polarsys.chess.core.views.DiagramStatus getDiagramStatus(org.eclipse.papyrus.editor.PapyrusMultiDiagramEditor editor)
        Get the DiagramStatus object of the CHESS Service given the Papyrus editor.
        Parameters:
        the - editor It should be not null.
        Returns:
        the DiagramStatus object. It can be null.

      • getDiagramStatus

        public static org.polarsys.chess.core.views.DiagramStatus getDiagramStatus(org.eclipse.papyrus.infra.core.services.ServicesRegistry registry)
        Get the DiagramStatus object of the CHESS Service given the Papyrus service registry.
        Parameters:
        registry. - It should be not null.
        Returns:
        the DiagramStatus object. It can be null.

      • isCHESSProject

        public static boolean isCHESSProject(org.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart editor)
        Check if the editor passed as a parameter is a CHESS editor; that is if the input of the editor belongs to a project with the CHESS nature
        Parameters:
        the - editor. It should be not null.
        Returns:
        true if it is a CHESS editor, false otherwise.

      • reopenEditor

        public static void reopenEditor(org.eclipse.ui.IEditorPart editor,
                                java.lang.Boolean save)
        Reopen the Papyrus Editor specified in the parameter. Optionally the editor input can be saved before reopening.
        Parameters:
        editor - the Editor to reopen. It should be not null.
        save - set this parameter to true to save the input

      • showConfirmDialog

        public static org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.MessageDialog showConfirmDialog(org.eclipse.ui.part.EditorPart editor,
                                                                        java.lang.String dialogTitle,
                                                                        java.lang.String dialogMessage)
        Utility function to create a confirmation Dialog with "OK", "no" and "cancel" buttons.
        Parameters:
        editor - the editor the dialog belongs to. It should be not null.
        dialogTitle - the title of the dialog
        dialogMessage - the message to display
        Returns:
        the MessageDialog created.

      • cleanAllDiagrams

        public static void cleanAllDiagrams()
        Utility function to remove orphan views from all the diagrams defined in the notation model
        Since:
        0.11
